Uses of Interface
net.sf.ehcache.distribution.CacheManagerPeerProvider

Packages that use CacheManagerPeerProvider
net.sf.ehcache This package contains the public API for using ehcache. 
net.sf.ehcache.config This package contains the cache configuration code. 
net.sf.ehcache.distribution This package is for cache replication. 
net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jgroups This package is for cache replication using Jgroups. 
 

Uses of CacheManagerPeerProvider in net.sf.ehcache
 

Methods in net.sf.ehcache that return CacheManagerPeerProvider
 CacheManagerPeerProvider CacheManager.getCacheManagerPeerProvider()
          Gets the CacheManagerPeerProvider, which can be useful for programmatically adding peers.
 CacheManagerPeerProvider CacheManager.getCachePeerProvider()
          Gets the CacheManagerPeerProvider For distributed caches, the peer provider finds other cache managers and their caches in the same cluster
